snippet.title: Ghost Manor for the Atari 2600
snippet.description:
Quite fun and challenging game, especially the last stage where you have to defeat Dracula is quite a challenge.

It also looks and sounds great. ;)

This game offers different stages and many difficulty settings, so it offers some variety.

But...is the stage where you play tag with the rainbow-colored ghost (or skeleton in the higher difficulties) really necessary?
